title: Research Support
job_overview:
Job Description:

We are a US-based high-end research software company in the government contracting industry looking to grow our research team. As a member of our research team, you will have a chance to partake in our mission to provide customized, real-time, and accurate capture intelligence not available elsewhere.

Responsibilities:
-Conducting online research
-Making phone calls to gather information related to government contracts
-Writing reports and emails
-Analyzing data
-Support any other internal efforts as needed

You'd be a good fit if:
-You have excellent English communication skills (both verbal and written)
-You are willing to learn and work hard
-You are comfortable conducting phone calls
-You have passion and tenacity to make a meaningful impact

Even if you don't meet all the criteria or have exact aligned experience, we encourage you to apply. We provide the necessary training to be successful in the role.

This is a full time role with working hours 8:30am EST to 5:30pm EST Monday thru Friday.

How to Apply:
Please share the best email to reach you at and a recruiter will reach out with next steps.
